attributes.action: Show documentaries about animal agriculture e.g Cowspiracy &Earthlings in school
attributes.additional_details:
Love animals? Watch Earthlings.

Love the Earth? Worried about its uncertain future? Watch Cowspiracy.

Do you recycle, turn the tap off when brushing your teeth or walk/cycle when you can rather than drive? Are you hearing about the global warming issues caused by us, to this planet? Are you concerned about the uncertain future of this planet for future generations? Road, rail, air and marine transportation makes up for 13% of the global greenhouse emission. Animal agriculture makes 51%.
attributes.background: We've all been taught for many years that we NEED meat and eggs for protein, we NEED calcium from dairy products for strong bones. Lets teach our future generations the truth about the impact of animal agriculture to not just our bodies, but the planet too.

rejection.details: It's up to individual schools to decide which materials they use. You could start a new petition calling for changes to the national curriculum, so that children are taught about the impact of animal agriculture.
